Html:
Hi,

I run the demo application and enter my city(Cebu city, Philippines. lat=10.3098685 lon=123.8931334) and tried to make some route from one place into another but no sign of route was made.

Is routing on this city possible with gmap.net? If yes, how?

Hope you can help me on this as I am creating a simple application for transportation routing on this city.

thanks & regards

gp
maybe google doesnt provide routing in that city, try openstreet routing, check http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=220374

Thanks for the quick reply.

I tried bing map and openstreet map but they didn't create a routing path for my city.

I checked the link you have provided and I saw this www.yournavigation.org and tried it and yes it creates a routing path in my city.

How can I able to incorporate this in my application using gmap.net? 

 

hope you can help me on this.

 

thanks & regards

gp

I think you are referring to this location https://hg01.codeplex.com/forks/viktorbergman/viktorbergman/rev/d840a2464e13.

I am sorry in bothering you with this as I am new to this and willing to learn.

If you don't mind explaining on how to use it or maybe a simple example?

I greatly appreciated your generosity.

regards

gp
p.s. this feature is now implemented in OpenStreetMap provider
